speakerphone.translation[0].definitions[: a telephone that contains a microphone and a loudspeaker, so that you can use it without holding it. Speakerphones are especially used in business meetings when groups of people in different places want to talk to each other.
speakerphone.translation[1].definitions[: a telephone that you can use without holding it near your face, so that a small group of people can hear and take part in the conversation
a handsfree speakerphone with digital sound enhancement
